00034 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DIFFERENCE_H
00035 #define CONSTRAINT_DIFFERENCE_H
00036 
00037 
00038 #ifdef P
00039 #undef P
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 //#define P(x) cout << x << endl
00043 #define P(x)
00044 
00046 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00047 struct DifferenceConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00048 {
00049   virtual string constraint_name()
00050   { return "Difference"; }
00051   
00052   VarRef1 var1;
00053   VarRef2 var2;
00054   VarRef3 var3;
00055   DifferenceConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, VarRef1 _var1, VarRef2 _var2, VarRef3 _var3) :
00056     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var1(_var1), var2(_var2), var3(_var3)
00057   {  }
00058   
00059   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00060   {
00061     triggerCollection t;
00062     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), LowerBound));
00063     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 2), LowerBound));
00064     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 3), LowerBound));
00065     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00066     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 2), UpperBound));
00067     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 3), UpperBound));
00068     return t;
00069   }
00070   
00071   template<typename Var>
00072   void remove_range(DomainInt low, DomainInt high, Var& v)
00073   {
00074     P("Remove Range" << low << high);
00075     D_ASSERT(low <= high);
00076     if(!v.isBound())
00077     {
00078       for(DomainInt i = low + 1; i < high; ++i)
00079         v.removeFromDomain(i);
00080     } 
00081     else
00082     {
00083       if(v.getMax() < high)
00084         v.setMax(low + 1);
00085       
00086       if(v.getMin() > low)
00087         v.setMin(high - 1);
00088     }
00089   }
00090     
00091   virtual void propagate(int, DomainDelta)
00092   {
00093       PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Difference);
00094     
00095       DomainInt var1_min = var1.getMin();
00096       DomainInt var1_max = var1.getMax();
00097       DomainInt var2_min = var2.getMin();
00098       DomainInt var2_max = var2.getMax();
00099 
00100     P(var1_min << var1_max << var2_min << var2_max << var3.getMin() << var3.getMax());
00101 
00102     var3.setMax(max(var2_max, var1_max) - min(var1_min, var2_min));
00103 
00104     var1.setMin(var2.getMin() - var3.getMax());
00105     var2.setMin(var1.getMin() - var3.getMax());
00106     var1.setMax(var2.getMax() + var3.getMax());
00107     P(var2.getMax());
00108     var2.setMax(var1.getMax() + var3.getMax());
00109     P(var2.getMax());
00110         
00111     if(var1_max < var2_min)
00112     {
00113       var3.setMin(var2_min - var1_max);
00114       var2.setMin(var1.getMin() + var3.getMin());
00115       var1.setMax(var2.getMax() - var3.getMin());
00116     }
00117 
00118     if(var2_max < var1_min)
00119     {
00120       var3.setMin(var1_min - var2_max);
00121       var1.setMin(var2.getMin() + var3.getMin());
00122     P(var2.getMax());
00123           var2.setMax(var1.getMax() - var3.getMin());
00124               P(var2.getMax());
00125     }
00126       
00127     if(var1_max - var1_min < var3.getMin())
00128     {
00129       remove_range(var1_max - var3.getMin(), var1_min + var3.getMin(), var2);
00130     }
00131     
00132     if(var2_max - var2_min < var3.getMin())
00133     {
00134       remove_range(var2_max - var3.getMin(), var2_min + var3.getMin(), var1);
00135     }
00136     
00137     
00138     
00139   }
00140   
00141   virtual void full_propagate()
00142   { 
00143     var3.setMin(0);
00144     propagate(0,0);
00145   }
00146   
00147   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00148   {
00149       D_ASSERT(v_size == 3);
00150     int abs_val = v[0] - v[1];
00151     if(abs_val < 0) abs_val = - abs_val;
00152       return abs_val == v[2];
00153   }
00154   
00155   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00156   {
00157     for(int i = var1.getMin(); i <= var1.getMax(); ++i)
00158     {
00159       if(var1.inDomain(i))
00160       {
00161           for(int j = var2.getMin(); j <= var2.getMax(); ++j)
00162           {
00163             if(var2.inDomain(j) && var3.inDomain(abs(i - j)))
00164             {
00165               assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, i));
00166               assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, j));
00167               assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, abs(i - j)));
00168               return true;
00169             }
00170           }
00171       }
00172     }
00173     return false;
00174   }
00175   
00176   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00177   { 
00178     vector<AnyVarRef> v;
00179     v.push_back(var1);
00180     v.push_back(var2);
00181     v.push_back(var3);
00182     return v;
00183   }
00184   
00185      // Function to make it reifiable in the lousiest way.
00186   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00187   {
00188       vector<AnyVarRef> t;
00189       t.push_back(var1);
00190       t.push_back(var2);
00191       t.push_back(var3);
00192       return new CheckAssignConstraint<vector<AnyVarRef>, DifferenceConstraint>(stateObj, t, *this);
00193   }
00194 };
00195 
00196 
00197 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2>
00198 AbstractConstraint*
00199 BuildCT_DIFFERENCE(StateObj* stateObj,const vector<VarRef1>& vars, const vector<VarRef2>& var2, ConstraintBlob&)
00200 { 
00201   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 2);
00202   D_ASSERT(var2.size() == 1);
00203   return new DifferenceConstraint<VarRef1,VarRef1,VarRef2>(stateObj, vars[0], vars[1], var2[0]); 
00204 }
00205 
00206 #endif
